events.title: Intro to PyTorch
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of PyTorch, including tensors, neural networks, and how to build basic deep learning models.

events.title: Text Generation Models Workshop
events.description: Explore modern text generation models like GPT and learn about the underlying transformer architecture, training approaches, and practical applications.

events.title: Weights and Biases Workshop
events.description: Learn how to use Weights & Biases (W&B) for experiment tracking, visualization, and collaboration in machine learning projects.

events.title: DSC S23 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Spring 2023 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: DSC S23 Mentor/Mentee Social
events.description: Connect with your DSC mentors and mentees while enjoying food and fun activities with the data science community.
